body:
Team,

Fulton - I see your v1.13.0 deployment! The implementation looks correct per my specs:

âœ… Default date range: Current month to 6 months ahead
âœ… Date params: 'start/end' format (YYYY-MM-DD)
âœ… Field used: startDate
âœ… Recurring events: ALWAYS returned regardless of date filter

Sarah - Fulton's fix is deployed. You should now see ~384 events (not 1034) matching Express behavior.
